entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET MAUI Maps custom object in map Pin #9909
  • .NET MAUI maps custom vector map capability #9908
  • .NET MAUI maps offline or caching capability #9907
  • [MAUI-Windows] "Element not found. (0x80070490)" exception occurs when ScrollView is inside a FlexLayout #9905
  • The image is not rendered on iOS only the first time #9902
  • Image size is not stable on MacOS and iOS #9899
  • Directory.GetFiles/CreateDirectory/Exists..etc throw System.UnauthorizedAccessException when only a folder is specified #9898
  • Android Emulator Tries to Start but then Crashes and Disappears #9897

Closed

  • Exception occurs when using System.IO.Ports #9870
  • Review code in Shell that's there to prevent overdraw on the navbar/statusbar #5217
    7.0-rc2
  • Entry controls don't play well in any layout if you want them to be side by side #9906
  • Geolocation functionality never return any result and hangs even with timeout set to 10 seconds #9895

PullRequests

Merged

  • Remove SplitDrawable from Shell code #9896

Updated

  • [Android] Implement logic to move focus to next Entry #5740
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 Planning
  • [Android] Update Entry behavior closing the Keyboard #7635
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 7.0-rc2
  • [Android] Fix crash using a Name in a GradientStop #9865
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, high
  • Build the net6 templates in net7 #9758
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
